title: Workitu Tech Website
description: The official Workitu Tech portfolio website showcasing our innovative AI solutions and digital experiences. Built with Next.js 14, featuring a stunning gold-themed design, video backgrounds, multilingual support, and a comprehensive admin dashboard for content management.

title: The Poly Player
description: An AI-powered analytics platform for prediction market traders on Polymarket. Features probability estimates, Kelly Criterion bet sizing optimization, and value calculations to help traders make data-driven decisions. Rated 4.8/5 stars by 127+ users.

title: Job Genie AI
description: Job Genie AI is an autonomous job-search agent. You upload your resume once, and it continuously finds real openings across multiple sources, matches them to your profile, prevents duplicates, and sends tailored applications automatically. Every action is logged live in the Agent Activity panel, daily email summaries are sent, and all data is stored for tracking results.

title: Hebrew Flow
description: A revolutionary way to study Hebrew using AI-generated music. Learn Hebrew through personalized songs and melodies created by artificial intelligence, making language learning more engaging and effective.

title: Adventures AI
description: A fully AI-generated adventure game where every player choice creates new content. The game works in 5 languages and generates unique gameplay experiences based on player decisions, creating infinite replayability.

title: AI Demo Video 1
description: Advanced AI demonstration showcasing cutting-edge artificial intelligence capabilities and real-world applications.

title: AI Demo Video 2
description: Innovative AI technology demonstration featuring advanced machine learning algorithms and intelligent automation systems.

title: Clear Eight
description: A cutting-edge AI platform that provides advanced solutions for data processing, analysis, and intelligent automation. Experience the future of AI-driven technology.
